mainText:
I lost part of my technology world. He is my aspiration, he was one
of the reasons of my new tech knowledge.he made the real changes, he made
the real technology, he made the impossible. Will NEVER forget you ever.
your tunes will keeps you alive, in everything you made and everything have
not made yet, at least in my life time.
header: Will never forget you ever Steve never...
author: suleman
